'''1.21.131.1''' (ChromeOS, Android) or '''1.21.131.2''' (Windows), is the second Preview version for [[Minecraft Education 1.21.131]], released for ChromeOS and Android on December 18, 2025, and for Windows on December 23, 2025, which adds features from the [[Mounts of Mayhem]] drop.<ref>{{citation|url=https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360047556451-Minecraft-Education-Change-Log|title=Minecraft Education Change Log|website=edusupport.minecraft.net|author=Justin}}</ref>

== Additions ==
{{main|Bedrock Edition 1.21.120|Bedrock Edition 1.21.130}}
* Added features and items from [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.120]] and [[Bedrock Edition 1.21.130]], '''[[Mounts of Mayhem]]'''.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
* Dedicated Server updates.

== Fixes ==
* Bugfixes and stability improvements.</onlyinclude>
